name: SuperCOLD (yourlx)
description:
SuperCOLD the game about time! Time stops when you moves... Wait, what?
I took the concept of SuperHOT (time moves when you moves). So that's what i've got in this jam!

Controls:
WASD - move
E - pickup items
RightMouseClick - drop items
LeftMouseClick - shoot
Space - jump

How to beat: Just kill all the enemies. That's all...

This is was 72h jam. I spent 1st day to a: exams (real life), mechanics and modelling, rigging and animating. The 2nd day - technically I didn't do anything. The 3nd day - AI, sounds, music, itch.io page.

What i used:
Game engine: Unity (2020.3.11f1)
Modelling, rigging, animating: Blender (2.93)
Sounds: Audacity + Logitech C720 (lol it's my microphone)
Music: Beepbox.co

I have no time to set the UI, menu and some of the features.
Not the best game i've done...
But if i get enough feedback i will continue to work on game (I hope SuperHot devs don't mind).

Made for "MashUp Game Jam 2" by yourlx
